articles.title: Article: Unbridled hot hatch fun - Drivesouth
articles.description: While Hayden Paddon was getting to grips with his new Hyundai i20 WRC2 rally car in Europe a couple of weeks back, David Thomson slipped behind its road-going equivalent on local roads...
articles.content:
While Hayden Paddon was getting to grips with his new Hyundai i20 WRC2 rally car in Europe a couple of weeks back, David Thomson slipped behind its road-going equivalent on local roads.
